original_text: At this time, Nebat's son Jeroboam was still in Egypt. He had been living there since he ran away from King Solomon. When he heard the news about Rehoboam, he returned home.
korean_text: 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 전에 솔로몬 왕의 얼굴을 피하여 애굽으로 도망하여 있었더니 이제 그 소문을 듣고 여전히 애굽에 있는 중에

sentences.original_text: Nebat's son Jeroboam was still in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 느밧의 아들 여로보암은 아직 이집트에 있었다

sentences.original_text: since he ran away from King Solomon
When he heard the news about Rehoboam
